original_title: Oscar's Black Odyssey: From Hattie to Halle
overview: Between 1939 and 2002, Black actors and Actresses received a combined total of 30 Academy Award nominations - only a handful made the odyssey to the podium to possess the Golden Man. This special program is filled with rare footage, photographs and long lost trailers of performances in Oscar-recognized films from GONE WITH THE WIND to MONSTER'S BALL.
title: Oscar's Black Odyssey: From Hattie to Halle
